subject: Investing
title: The Bond Market's Invisible Power
description: Learn The Bond Market's Invisible Power in one minute.

hook.text: When the bond market moves, presidents listen. Bond yields influence mortgages, loans, and entire economies.

buildup.text: The bond market is where interest rates are really set. Central banks guide, but traders decide.

discovery.text: When bond prices fall, yields rise. Higher yields mean higher borrowing costs for everyone.

twist.text: James Carville said he wanted to be reincarnated as the bond market, because it can intimidate everybody.

climax.text: In 2022, rising bond yields crashed housing, tech stocks, and crypto simultaneously.

punchline.text: The stock market gets the headlines. The bond market sets the rules.

quiz.question: What happens to borrowing costs when bond yields rise?
